list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Add custom icon to executable and update PyInstaller configuration
- Converted PNG icon to ICO format and added it to the executable using PyInstaller. - Updated PyInstaller command to include the custom icon for a professional application appearance. - Created hidden folder in the user's Documents for key storage, with OS-specific handling (Windows, macOS/Linux).

task.summary:
feat: Enhance UI with modern styling and improved user experience
- Added custom fonts for title, labels, and buttons. - Improved layout with frames for better widget organization. - Updated background and button colors for a sleek, professional look. - Applied consistent padding and margins for a structured layout. - Styled buttons with flat design and hover effects for better interaction.

feat: Add secure password entry page with modern UI and animations
- Implemented a password entry page with encrypted password verification using hashlib. - Added fade-in animation for a smooth user experience. - Designed the UI with modern, professional styling and custom fonts. - Integrated password validation to open the folder locker page upon correct password entry.

feat: Add secure password entry page with modern UI and animations
- Implemented a password entry page with encrypted password verification using hashlib. - Added fade-in animation for a smooth user experience. - Designed the UI with modern, professional styling and custom fonts. - Integrated password validation to open the folder locker page upon correct password entry.
